title: Centralization as System Fragility
pattern: Essential survival assets are consolidated into single points of failure (vaults, grids, monocultures) for the sake of control or efficiency.
signal: Claims of global security resting on one site, one technology, or one authority.
impact: Introduces fragility by design; erases distributed, relational models that mirror ecological resilience.
